com.viaoa.jfc.report

Class OAHTMLCertificatePdf

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jfc.report.OAHTMLCertificatePdf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAPrintable, Printable

    public class OAHTMLCertificatePdf
extends Object
implements OAPrintable
    This uses HTML that has a (hi-res) background image to create a certificate the size of the background image. This is used with OAPdf to create the pdf. This is based on the fact that OAHTMLTextPane was used to create a <DIV> with a background image:

    • Field Summary

      • getPrintSize

        public Dimension getPrintSize(int pageIndex,
                              PageFormat pageFormat,
                              int width)
        Description copied from interface: OAPrintable
        Used to know the size of a page. This is used for reports that have multiple printables per page, usually when using a header and footer. Note: This could be called before the page is actually printed. In most cases, this will return the total size of the printable.
        Specified by:
        getPrintSize in interface OAPrintable
        pageFormat - which has sizes in points - (which might need to be converted to pixels, for comparisons)
        width - is in pixels
